description.narrative: By the end of 2019, mechanisms to monitor public investment in children exist at all three levels of government and actions have been implemented to improve distribution across all groups of child rights.

mailing-address.narrative: Paseo de la Reforma 645 Col. Lomas de Chapultepec México D.F. 11000

sector.narrative: Child poverty analysis towards policy change (Profiling, mapping and identifying drivers of multi-dimensional and monetary poverty of children, modelling and simulation of policy options)
Public finance management in social protection

title.narrative: UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Mexico 2018 Annual Report on Results for Children
Mexico 2019 Annual Report on Results for Children
Mexico 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By the end of 2019, mechanisms to monitor public investment in children exist at all three levels of government and actions have been implemented to improve distribution across all groups of child rights.

description.narrative: In 2019, UNICEF worked to strengthen data collection and improved capacities at the subnational level, mainly with the Government of Mexico City, by supporting the implementation of the Mi Beca para Empezar cash transfer. | Status:Met | As-of Date:23/01/2020

title.narrative: Nios, nias y adolescentes en mayor vulnerabilidad tienen cobertura de sistemas de proteccin social.

baseline.value: 45.51% de los nios, nias y adolescentes en pobreza multidimensional no tienen acceso a programas federales de proteccin social.

title.narrative: Porcentaje del gasto social en el presupuesto federal asignado a programas focalizados en los nios, nias y adolescentes en situacin de pobreza extrema, (multidimensional).

baseline.value: 6% del gasto federal se focaliza explcitamente en los nios, nias y adolescentes en pobreza extrema.

title.narrative: (NOT VALID after Dec 31 2017) Information and reports on child-focused public expenditures (direct, indirect and total) is made available by governments

target.value: 2017:Indirect reports on child focused expenditure area made available by the government

title.narrative: Nmero de programas en el Presupuesto de Egresos de la Federacin vinculado con los derechos a la proteccin y a la participacin.

baseline.value: En el derecho a la participacin y el derecho a la proteccin 0 y 4 programas presupuestarios forman parte, respectivamente, del PEF 2012

target.value: 2019:En el derecho a la participaci¿n y el derecho a la protecci¿n 2 y 8 programas presupuestarios forman parte, respectivamente, del PEF 2019.

actual.value: 2020:6 programas vinculados con el derecho a la Participación y 7 vinculados al derecho a la Protección
